lead_paragraph: This documentary, directed by Marah Strauch, is a bittersweet take on a man who looked at very tall things and saw an opportunity to jump.

headline.print_headline: Review: Sunshine Superman; About the High-Flying Daredevil Carl Boenish
headline.main: Review: ‘Sunshine Superman,’ About the High-Flying Daredevil Carl Boenish

snippet: This documentary, directed by Marah Strauch, is a bittersweet take on a man who looked at very tall things and saw an opportunity to jump.
abstract: Neil Genzlinger reviews Marah Strauch documentary film Sunshine Superman.
